Package org.zurdavid.petrinets.model

Class Petrinet

java.lang.Object
org.zurdavid.petrinets.model.Petrinet
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPetrinet
public class Petrinet extends Object implements IPetrinet
The class implements the IPetrinet Interface and serves as the main class to model a Petri net in the application.

      public void addTokens(String placeId, int x)
      Description copied from interface: IPetrinet

      Specified by:
